Crometta S Showerpipe 240 1jet EcoSmart Reno GP

Why this product is special

The fresh look of Crometta will delight fans of timeless modern bathrooms. Enjoy a wonderful showering experience at a great price. From the hand shower to the shower system: this range is uncomplicated – and ideal for quick renovations.

A shower that uses up to 60% less water than conventional models and thus also reduces energy costs.

The water flow, shower or jet type can be easily adjusted at the touch of a button.

The particularly large overhead shower ensures XL shower moments. It’s never been nicer to stand in the rain.

Crometta S from hansgrohe is synonymous with high-quality shower design at an attractive price.

Product Line Crometta S

With a Crometta S Showerpipe in a timeless yet modern design, you add a fresh, organic touch to your bathroom.

Product Line Crometta S

With more than 1.2 million products sold, our shower best-seller pampers all your senses with Rain and other spray types, which cascade from its large, round shower head.

Product Line Crometta S

Innovative technologies

Intuitive jet adjustment

The Select push button simplifies daily bathroom routines, as one simple push is all it takes for water to flow or stop. When showering, the user-friendly button can change the spray type or switch from the overhead to the hand shower.

Want to save water? With pleasure!

This shower head uses up to 40% less water than our conventional showers. In this way, it reduces water and energy costs every day and conserves valuable resources. For long-lasting soothing showering pleasure.

Less limescale, more joy

Who actually likes cleaning? Limescale deposits and dirt disappear in an instant with this technology. Simply rub the flexible silicone discs or nozzles with a finger. It’s fast and keeps cleaning to a minimum.

Great showering pleasure

XXL showering indulgence that envelops the complete body in real-life dreams of water using wonderfully soothing spray types from hand showers and overhead showers with diameters of 100 to 600 mm.

Intuitive jet adjustment

Intuitive jet adjustment

The Select push button simplifies daily bathroom routines, as one simple push is all it takes for water to flow or stop. When showering, the user-friendly button can change the spray type or switch from the overhead to the hand shower.

Want to save water? With pleasure!

Want to save water? With pleasure!

This shower head uses up to 40% less water than our conventional showers. In this way, it reduces water and energy costs every day and conserves valuable resources. For long-lasting soothing showering pleasure.

Less limescale, more joy

Less limescale, more joy

Who actually likes cleaning? Limescale deposits and dirt disappear in an instant with this technology. Simply rub the flexible silicone discs or nozzles with a finger. It’s fast and keeps cleaning to a minimum.

Great showering pleasure

Great showering pleasure

XXL showering indulgence that envelops the complete body in real-life dreams of water using wonderfully soothing spray types from hand showers and overhead showers with diameters of 100 to 600 mm.

Invigorating and energising everyday showering indulgence with a satisfyingly full shower rain. With its small outlets on the shower head, this spray type works efficiently to thoroughly rinse out shampoo.

Rain

Invigorating and energising everyday showering indulgence with a satisfyingly full shower rain. With its small outlets on the shower head, this spray type works efficiently to thoroughly rinse out shampoo.

Our name is your guarantee

Five-year manufacturer’s guarantee

Always creating the highest quality products defines our approach to design, manufacturing and performance. ‘Made by Hansgrohe’ is your assurance of quality.

Save water and give back to the planet

Article features

Consists of: overhead shower, hand shower, shower hose, slider, wall outlet

overhead shower Crometta S 240

shower head size overhead shower: 240 mm

spray type overhead shower: Rain

convenient diversion via Select button

Flow rate Rain (at 3 bar): 9 l/min

Maximum flow rate for Showerpipe at 3 bar: 9 l/min

Min. operating pressure: 1,2 bar

Max. operating pressure: 10 bar

overhead shower angle adjustable

hand shower holder inclination angle can be adjusted by 45°

exposed design allows easy installation, all working parts are outside of the wall

pipe can be shortened in height

height-adjustable hand shower holder

Shower arm length: 350 mm

Connection thread: ½"

suitable for continuous flow water heaters

WRAS 2312044

WRAS (Water Regulations Advisory Scheme)

The Water Regulations Advisory Scheme (WRAS) is the UK Water Industry's approval scheme. Products approved by the scheme have been shown to comply with the requirements of the Water Supply (Water Fittings) Regulations 1999 and amendments.
